interpretation.title: Interpretation

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.intro: For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:

booking.definition: means a reservation made by a Renter through the Platform to use a Studio for a specified date, time, and duration.

company.definition: (referred to as "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to Studioz, Allenby 70, Tel Aviv, Israel.

content.definition: refers to any text, images, reviews, descriptions, or other information that can be posted, uploaded, or otherwise made available through the Service.

country.definition: refers to the State of Israel.

device.definition: means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone, or a digital tablet.

listing.definition: means a Studio Owner's published description of a Studio on the Platform, including its availability, pricing, amenities, and rules.

platform.definition: refers to the Studioz marketplace that connects Studio Owners with Renters.

renter.definition: means a User who searches for, books, or uses Studios through the Platform.

service.definition: refers to the Website and the Platform.

serviceFee.definition: means the fee charged by the Company to Studio Owners and/or Renters for the use of the Platform, as detailed in the Fees and Payments section.

studioOwner.definition: means a User who lists and offers Studios for rent through the Platform.

studio.definition: refers to the physical space listed on the Platform by a Studio Owner for use by Renters.

user.definition: means any individual, company, or legal entity that accesses or uses the Service, whether as a Renter, Studio Owner, or visitor.

thePlatform.title: The Platform
thePlatform.paragraph1: Studioz operates as an online marketplace that connects Studio Owners who wish to rent out their spaces with Renters who are looking to book studios for various purposes, including but not limited to music recording, photography, rehearsal, podcasting, and other creative activities.
thePlatform.paragraph2: The Company acts solely as an intermediary platform and is not a party to any agreement between Studio Owners and Renters. The Company does not own, manage, or control any Studios listed on the Platform.
thePlatform.paragraph3: The Company does not guarantee the quality, safety, legality, or suitability of any Studio listed on the Platform. Studio Owners are solely responsible for the accuracy of their Listings and compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
thePlatform.paragraph4: The Company does not act as an agent for either Studio Owners or Renters. Any agreement for the use of a Studio is directly between the Studio Owner and the Renter.

userAccounts.paragraph1: When You create an Account with Us, You must provide Us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of Your Account.
userAccounts.paragraph2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password that You use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under Your Account, whether Your password is with Our Service or a third-party authentication provider.

userAccounts.paragraph5: You may register as a Renter, a Studio Owner, or both. Each role carries specific obligations as outlined in these Terms.

obligations.title: Studio Owner Obligations
obligations.description: As a Studio Owner, You agree to:

items.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information in Your Listings, including descriptions, photos, availability, pricing, amenities, and any rules or restrictions.
items.legal: Ensure Your Studio complies with all applicable Israeli laws, regulations, building codes, safety requirements, and licensing requirements.
items.availability: Keep Your availability calendar up to date and honor confirmed Bookings.
items.condition: Maintain Your Studio in a safe and clean condition as described in Your Listing.
items.insurance: Maintain appropriate insurance coverage for Your Studio as required by law.
items.taxes: Comply with all applicable tax obligations, including reporting income from Bookings and charging VAT where required under Israeli tax law.
items.accessibility: Accurately represent the accessibility features of Your Studio in accordance with the Equal Rights for Persons with Disabilities Law, 5758-1998.

listings.title: Listings
listings.paragraph1: You are solely responsible for the content and accuracy of Your Listings. The Company reserves the right to remove or modify any Listing that violates these Terms or applicable law.
listings.paragraph2: By creating a Listing, You represent and warrant that You have all necessary rights, permissions, and authority to list and rent out the Studio.

obligations.title: Renter Obligations
obligations.description: As a Renter, You agree to:

items.rules: Comply with the Studio rules and guidelines specified in the Listing and by the Studio Owner.
items.care: Treat the Studio and its equipment with reasonable care and return it in the same condition as received, subject to normal wear and tear.
items.timing: Arrive and vacate the Studio within the Booked time slot.
items.damage: Be liable for any damage caused to the Studio or its equipment during Your Booking, beyond normal wear and tear.
items.legal: Use the Studio only for lawful purposes.
items.occupancy: Not exceed the maximum occupancy specified in the Listing.

bookings.title: Bookings and Reservations
bookings.paragraph1: A Booking is confirmed when the Renter completes the payment process through the Platform. Upon confirmation, both the Renter and the Studio Owner are bound by the terms of the Booking.
bookings.paragraph2: The Company does not guarantee that any particular Studio will be available at any given time. Studio availability is managed by Studio Owners through the Platform.
bookings.paragraph3: By making a Booking, You acknowledge that You are entering into an agreement with the Studio Owner for the use of their Studio, and the Company is not a party to that agreement.

consumerRights.title: Your Cancellation Rights Under Israeli Law
consumerRights.paragraph1: In accordance with the Israeli Consumer Protection Law, 5741-1981 (חוק הגנת הצרכן) and the Consumer Protection Regulations (Transaction Cancellation), You have the right to cancel a Booking within the following terms:

items.timeframe: You may cancel a Booking within 14 days of making the Booking, provided that the cancellation is made at least 2 days before the scheduled Booking date.
items.refund: Upon valid cancellation, You are entitled to a full refund minus cancellation fees not exceeding 5% of the transaction amount or 100 ILS, whichever is lower, as permitted by law.
items.method: Refunds will be processed using the same payment method used for the original transaction.

platformPolicy.title: Platform Cancellation Policy
platformPolicy.paragraph1: In addition to Your statutory rights under Israeli law, the following cancellation terms apply:

items.renter: Renters may cancel a Booking in accordance with the Studio Owner's cancellation policy as stated in the Listing, subject to the minimum rights granted by Israeli consumer protection law.
items.studioOwner: Studio Owners who cancel a confirmed Booking may be subject to penalties, including reduced visibility in search results and potential Account suspension for repeated cancellations.
items.noShow: If a Renter fails to show up for a confirmed Booking without prior cancellation, the Renter forfeits the full Booking amount.
items.force: Cancellations due to force majeure events (as defined in these Terms) may be eligible for a full refund or credit at the Company's discretion.

serviceFees.title: Service Fees
serviceFees.paragraph1: The Company charges Service Fees to both Studio Owners and Renters for the use of the Platform. These fees are deducted automatically during the payment process.
serviceFees.paragraph2: The applicable Service Fees are displayed to You before You complete a Booking or confirm a Listing. By using the Platform, You agree to pay the applicable Service Fees.
serviceFees.paragraph3: The Company reserves the right to change its Service Fee structure at any time. Changes to Service Fees will be communicated in advance and will not apply to existing confirmed Bookings.

payments.title: Payments
payments.paragraph1: All payments are processed in Israeli New Shekels (₪ / ILS) through secure third-party payment processors. The Company does not directly store Your payment card details.
payments.paragraph2: Payment is collected from the Renter at the time of Booking. Funds are released to the Studio Owner after the Booking is completed, minus the applicable Service Fee.
payments.paragraph3: Payment methods include credit cards, debit cards, and other payment methods made available through the Platform (such as PayPal).

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.paragraph1: All prices displayed on the Platform are inclusive of VAT unless otherwise stated. Studio Owners are responsible for complying with their tax obligations under Israeli tax law.
taxes.paragraph2: The Company may be required to withhold taxes on payments to Studio Owners in accordance with applicable tax regulations.
